oshiSkill.name: リプレイスメント ("Replacement")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Swap one cheer card from your stage to one of your Holomen.

spOshiSkill.name: じゃあ敵だね ("then you're an enemy")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Switch your opponent's center Holomen with one of their back Holomen. Then, for the duration of this turn, your white center Holomen's arts increase by 50.

oshiSkill.name: 左手に地図 ("Map on the left")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable when rolling a die with your Holomen's ability: Declare one number on the die, and treat the next rolled number as the declared number.

spOshiSkill.name: 手にマイク ("Mic On the Right")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Send any number of archived cheer cards to one Green Holomen.

skills.name: あなたの心は･･･くもりのち晴れ!
シンパシー ンパシー
skills.description: When you have the Holomen 'AZKI' on your stage, this art gains +50.
